item.title: Amid starvation scenes in Gaza, Trump administration hardens tone on Hamas
item.description: Militants “didn’t want to make” a deal, Trump said after U.S., Israeli ceasefire negotiators pulled back from talks.

item.title: Texas plan to redraw maps could protect GOP House majority
item.description: The legislature is meeting in special session to draft plans that could give the party five more seats in Congress.
